item.title: 萨克斯百货或最早于周日申请第11章破产保护
item.description: Saks Global Enterprises, the cash-strapped luxury retailer, is planning to file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection as soon as Sunday, according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: 贝莱德表示英国信托基金未因合并削减SpaceX持股
item.description: 贝莱德集团（Baillie Gifford & Co.）反驳了激进投资者博阿兹·温斯坦（Boaz Weinstein）的指控。这位投资者要求这家苏格兰基金公司解释其旗下某信托基金为何减持SpaceX股份。【原文：Baillie Gifford & Co. pushed back against an attack by activist investor Boaz Weinstein, who’s demanded the Scottish fund house explain why one of its trusts sold down a stake in SpaceX.】

item.title: 安耐克敲定16亿美元续期基金，谋求业务扩张
item.description: 安耐克公司以16亿美元完成一笔交易，该交易将使其能够更长时间持有三项资产，同时该公司正为下一轮融资做准备。【原文：Onex Corp. collected $1.6 billion for a deal that will let it hold on to three assets for longer as the firm prepares for its next round of fundraising.】

item.title: ECB’s Lane Sees Euro Benefiting as Investors Question Dollar
item.description: 欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普·莱恩表示，随着美国总统特朗普的经济政策促使投资者重新考虑其美元持仓，他预计欧元将在投资者投资组合中发挥更大作用。【原文：European Central Bank Chief Economist Philip Lane said he expects the euro to play a bigger role in investors’ portfolios as US President Donald Trump’s economic policies lead them to rethink their dollar holdings.】

item.title: 交易员认为本月美联储降息可能性微乎其微
item.description: 美国国债价格下跌，交易员们几乎清空了押注美联储本月晚些时候降息的头寸，此前12月失业率降幅超出预期。【原文：Treasuries fell and traders all but wiped out their bets that the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates later this month after the unemployment rate for December fell more than expected.】

item.title: 梅洛尼表示愿意考虑未来出售意大利剩余的帕斯基股份
item.description: Italy’s Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said the government is open to selling its remaining Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA, even though there is “no rush” to do so.

item.title: US Housing Starts Fall to Lowest Level Since May 2020
item.description: 美国10月新屋开工量降至疫情暴发以来的最低水平。因去年秋季政府停摆而延迟公布的数据表明，在房价和抵押贷款利率仍居高位的情况下，建筑商持续缩减开工规模。【原文：Housing starts in the US fell in October to the lowest level since the onset of the pandemic as data delayed by last fall’s government shutdown showed builders continued to cut back amid still-high prices and mortgage rates.】

item.title: US Payrolls Rise Below-Forecast 50,000, Unemployment Lower
item.description: 美国雇主12月新增就业岗位数低于预期，表明年底劳动力市场持续走软。【原文：US employers added fewer jobs than expected in December, suggesting the labor market continued to soften at year-end.】

item.title: 加拿大就业人数增加8,200人，失业率升至6.8%
item.description: 加拿大经济连续第四个月实现就业增长，但失业率却有所上升，失业人数增幅创下三年新高。【原文：The Canadian economy posted employment gains for a fourth consecutive month, but the jobless rate rose as the number of unemployed people grew by the most in three years.】

item.title: BNP Paribas Gains Three New Bulls as Analysts Say Stock Is Cheap
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）在一周内获得三家机构的买入评级，分析师们对该股转为乐观，摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）称其为欧洲估值最低的银行。【原文：BNP Paribas SA gained a trio of bulls in one week as analysts turned positive on the stock, with JPMorgan Chase & Co. calling it the cheapest bank in Europe.】

item.title: Polestar Sales Rise on Newer Models After Yet Another Bailout
item.description: 在陷入困境的电动汽车制造商Polestar Automotive Holding UK Plc向母公司寻求更多援助以维持运营后，其销量出现跃升，展现出一些积极迹象。【原文：Polestar Automotive Holding UK Plc is showing some promising signs with a jump in sales after the troubled electric-car maker required more handouts from its parent to keep going.】

item.title: 特朗普将会见能源公司高管，阐述委内瑞拉计划
item.description: President Donald Trump is set to outline his vision for rebuilding Venezuela’s battered oil sector Friday in a meeting with representatives from 17 energy companies, including crude producers, refiners and commodity traders.

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行资深员工让-吕克·拉马尔克任职30年后离职
item.description: 据知情人士透露，债券市场资深人士让-吕克·拉马尔克已离开法国农业信贷银行，结束了在该行近30年的职业生涯。【原文：Bond market veteran Jean-Luc Lamarque has left Credit Agricole SA after a career at the bank spanning almost 30 years, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Andreessen Horowitz Raises $15 Billion in Its Largest-Ever Funding
item.description: 安德森·霍洛维茨基金已筹集逾150亿美元——创下其史上最高融资纪录——计划投资于人工智能、国防和生物技术等行业。【原文：Andreessen Horowitz has raised more than $15 billion — its biggest ever funding haul — with plans to invest in industries including artificial intelligence, defense and biotech.】

item.title: Worldline首席执行官在支付丑闻后表示愿意进一步出售资产
item.description: Worldline SA正考虑出售其核心欧洲支付业务以外的更多资产，该公司正试图在经历艰难的2025年后精简运营。【原文：Worldline SA is open to selling further assets outside of its core European payments offering as the firm attempts to streamline operations after a bruising 2025.】

item.title: US Jobs Data to Give First ‘Clean’ View of Labor Market Since Shutdown
item.description: 一名工人正在加利福尼亚州萨克拉门托市对金属门进行电弧焊接。摄影师：David Paul Morris/Bloomberg【原文：A worker arc welds a metal door in Sacramento, California. Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg】

item.title: 可可价格波动，出口商对冲抵消指数买盘
item.description: Cocoa whipsawed in New York, as exporters took advantage of buying related to index rebalancing to lock in more favorable prices.

item.title: 荷兰移动网络Odido据悉计划于明年1月启动10亿欧元IPO
item.description: 据知情人士透露，荷兰电信集团Odido正考虑最早于本月启动首次公开募股（IPO），预计融资额将达到约10亿欧元（12亿美元）或更高。【原文：Dutch telecommunications group Odido is considering launching an initial public offering as soon as this month that could raise about €1 billion ($1.2 billion) or more, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度外汇储备创14个月最大跌幅 卢比暴跌之际
item.description: India’s foreign exchange reserves recorded their biggest weekly drop in 14 months as the central bank sold dollars to support a weakening rupee, analysts said.

item.title: 巴西通胀放缓逼近目标水平，为降息铺平道路
item.description: 巴西12月年度通胀率有所回落，2025年通胀率最终维持在央行目标区间内，这增加了未来数月降息的可能性。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation eased in December, closing 2025 within the central bank’s target range and increasing the likelihood of interest rate cuts in the coming months.】

item.title: Tiny Greenland Lender Jumps 40% as Trump Fuels Investor Bonanza
item.description: 投资者押注围绕格陵兰的政治博弈将利好这片北极领地的商业发展，使岛上一家小型银行在2026年初成为欧洲表现最佳的股票之一。【原文：Investors are betting that a political battle over Greenland is good for the Arctic territory’s business, making a tiny bank located on the island into one of Europe’s best performing stocks in the early days of 2026.】

item.title: 铜价飙升，矿业交易热潮加速升温
item.description: 力拓集团与嘉能可公司正商讨达成协议，组建全球最大的矿业公司。【原文：Rio Tinto and Glencore discuss a deal to form the world’s largest miner.】

item.title: 帕台农基金拟通过17亿美元续期基金保留KBRA评级
item.description: 知情人士透露，帕台农资本合伙公司正向投资者推介一项二级市场交易，该交易将使其能够更长时间持有信用评级机构克罗尔债券评级机构。【原文：Parthenon Capital Partners is pitching investors on a secondary transaction that will allow it to hold on to credit grader Kroll Bond Rating Agency for longer, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Grok图像生成器将X平台变成深度伪造裸体工厂
item.description: 欢迎阅读《科技深度》——彭博社全球记者团队每日为您带来的科技商业资讯。今日，奥利维亚·索伦将探讨埃隆·马斯克旗下X平台上人工智能图像生成的意外用途。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Olivia Solon addresses the unintended use of AI image generation on Elon Musk’s X.】

item.title: 特朗普借鉴习近平住房政策手册
item.description: 美国总统计划严控私人住房投资，此举与中国采取的措施相呼应。【原文：The US president aims to crack down on investment in private housing, echoing China’s moves】

item.title: Fairfax增持安德玛股份，深化"加拿大伯克希尔"战略布局
item.description: Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd.收购Under Armour Inc.的大量股份后，这家陷入困境的服装制造商的股价已部分回升。这家加拿大保险公司采取的投资策略与伯克希尔·哈撒韦公司的投资策略颇为相似。【原文：Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd.’s acquisition of a big stake in Under Armour Inc. has seen the struggling apparel-maker’s shares stage a partial comeback, as the Canadian insurance firm builds on a playbook akin to Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s investment strategy.】

item.title: 捷克央行因克朗升值录得35亿美元亏损
item.description: 捷克央行在连续两年盈利后，于2025年出现亏损，原因是克朗升值的影响抵消了外汇储备带来的创纪录收入。【原文：The Czech central bank posted a loss in 2025 after two profitable years as the impact of a stronger koruna outweighed record income generated by its foreign currency reserves.】

item.title: Pharma Deals on the Rise as Industry Shakes Off Trump Anxiety
item.description: 下周，制药商将带着远比2025年更强烈的信心，齐聚旧金山的摩根大通医疗保健大会。【原文：Next week, drugmakers will arrive at the JPMorgan Healthcare Conference in San Francisco feeling far more confident than in 2025.】

item.title: European Sectors to Watch Ahead of Supreme Court Tariff Ruling
item.description: 欧洲股市投资者正为美国最高法院对特朗普总统"解放日"关税合法性裁决的潜在影响做准备。【原文：European stock investors are preparing for the implications of a US Supreme Court ruling on the legality of President Donald Trump’s “Liberation Day” tariffs.】

item.title: 中国反垄断机构调查外卖行业激烈竞争
item.description: 中国反垄断主管机构已对在线外卖市场的竞争行为展开调查，指出补贴驱动的价格战正在扭曲实体经济并助长"内卷"现象。【原文：China’s top antitrust body has launched an investigation into competition practices in the online food delivery market, citing concerns that subsidy-driven price wars are distorting the real economy and fueling “involution.”】
